Package com.group12.helper

Class OnlineGameHelper

java.lang.Object
com.group12.helper.OnlineGameHelper
public class OnlineGameHelper extends Object
The OnlineGameHelper class is responsible for having helper methods about game logic and setting up the board for online games.

      occupiedCircles - - Circles that are already occupied by all players.

    • getSettlementOptions

      Parameters:
      anchorPane - - Game board with tiles in the scene.
      occupiedCircles - - Circles that are already occupied by all players.
      ownedEdges - - Roads built by the player so far.
      Returns:
      - List of optional settlement ids

    • showRoadOptions

      public static void showRoadOptions(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane anchorPane, String circleId)
      A method to show optional roads specifically for the setup phase.
      Parameters:
      anchorPane - - Game board with tiles in the scene.
      circleId - - Settlement id which the optional roads will be around.

    • clearOptionals

      public static void clearOptionals(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane anchorPane, ArrayList<String> ownedCircles, ArrayList<String> ownedCities, ArrayList<String> occupiedCircles, ArrayList<String> occupiedEdges, String color)
      Parameters:
      anchorPane - - Game board with tiles in the scene.
      ownedCircles - - Settlements built by the player so far.
      ownedCities - - Cities built by the player so far.
      occupiedCircles - - Settlements that are already occupied by all players.
      occupiedEdges - - Roads that are already occupied by all players.
      color - - player's color

    • findLongestRoadLength

      public static int findLongestRoadLength(ArrayList<String> edges)
      A method to calculate the longest road length.
      Parameters:
      edges - - List of roads built by the player.
      Returns:
      - Longest consecutive road length.

    • getResourceTypes

      public static String getResourceTypes(String giveResourceStyle, String getResourceStyle)
      A helper method to extract resource types within the style list.
      Parameters:
      giveResourceStyle - - Style list which includes the selected resources type as a style attribute.
      getResourceStyle - - Style list which includes the selected resources type as a style attribute.
      Returns:
      - A pair of resource type to send with a trade offer message.

    • removeResourceTradeType

      public static void removeResourceTradeType(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle tradeGivenResource, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle tradeWantedResource)
      A helper method to clear the trade offer panel's old data.
      Parameters:
      tradeGivenResource - - GivenResource's type by the trade offer sender.
      tradeWantedResource - - WantedResource's type by the trade offer sender.

    • checkResourcesForTrade

      public static Boolean checkResourcesForTrade(String resourceType, int brick, int lumber, int ore, int grain, int wool)
      A helper method to decide if the trade offer accept button should be visible or not.
      Parameters:
      resourceType - - Type of resource that will be traded.
      brick - - Amount of brick resource.
      lumber - - Amount of lumber resource.
      ore - - Amount of ore resource.
      grain - - Amount of grain resource.
      wool - - Amount of wool resource.
      Returns:
      - A boolean value which specifies if the accept button should be visible or not.
